name: annotate-plasmid
title: Annotate Plasmid with pLannotate
description: Annotate DNA sequences using pLannotate's comprehensive plasmid feature database
content:
Overview

This application uses pLannotate to automatically annotate plasmid sequences by identifying common features such as promoters, genes, terminators, and origins of replication.

Features

  • Comprehensive annotation database
  • Supports both circular and linear sequences
  • Identifies promoters, ORFs, terminators, and more
  • Provides detailed feature information

Parameters

  • DNA Sequence: Plasmid sequence to annotate
  • Topology: Specify if sequence is linear (default is circular)

Output

Returns a JSON file with detailed annotations including feature names, types, positions, and descriptions.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni plannotate && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/annotate_plasmid.py "${sequence}" ${linear} -o "${outputDir}"
